wikipedia_page.main: Richard "Richie" Moran (born 9 September 1963) is a former professional footballer who played in the Football League for Birmingham City. He played as a centre forward.

response: * Richie Moran (footballer) (born 1963), British footballer, writer and anti-racism campaigner
* Richie Moran (lacrosse) (born 1930s), American lacrosse player and coach
*Richie Moran, footballer, was raised in Gosport
